headline: How to spot non-infrastructure AI plays worth investing in
summary: Lopez Research founder Maribel Lopez joins Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman to discuss Big Tech valuation concerns and to explain how investors can distinguish companies that are leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) and are worth investing in. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

content.title: How to spot non-infrastructure AI plays worth investing in
content.description:
Lopez Research founder Maribel Lopez joins Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman to discuss Big Tech valuation concerns and to explain how investors can distinguish companies that are leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) and are worth investing in.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
